Text:
Sorry for the confusion. The program does not require a serial key for installation or normal working but you need one to activate it and make the unregistered bar go.
I repeat you can use it normally even without activation. If it bothers you try LibreOffice:
http://www.libreoffice.org/
It is free and feature packed enough to satisfy an average user like me.
Does it still work after 30 or 60-day (trial period)?
Yes keeps on working fine even without activation.
You don't happen to have the x64 version?  Thanks.
Won't install for me tells me it can't install one of the programs
